mapper.select: select u_location from User where uid=#{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into Pet(peid, uid, pe_name, pe_profile_photo, pe_age,pe_weight, pe_trauma, pe_disease, pe_birthday) values(#{peid},#{uid}, #{pe_name},#{pe_profile_photo},#{pe_age},#{pe_weight},#{pe_trauma},#{pe_disease},#{pe_birthday})
mapper.select: select * from Health where peid=#{peid} where h_flag=0
mapper.update: update Pet set pe_flag=1 where peid=#{peid}
mapper.insert: insert into Allergy(aid, peid, al_name, al_flag) values(#{aid},#{peid}, #{al_name}, #{al_flag})
mapper.select: select * from Allergy where peid=#{peid} and al_flag=0
mapper.update: update Allergy set al_flag=1 where aid=#{aid}
